title: Security
twoFactorAuthDesc: TOTP-based 2FA with backup codes for enhanced security
jwtAuthenticationDesc: Token-based authentication for Console API requests
s3SignatureDesc: AWS-compatible signature authentication for S3 API
rateLimitingDesc: IP-based rate limiting ({{count}} login attempts per minute)
accountLockoutDesc: Automatic {{duration}} lockout after {{attempts}} failed login attempts
sessionManagementDesc: Automatic session timeout and idle detection ({{duration}})
rbacDesc: 4 roles: Admin, User, Read-Only, Guest with granular permissions
serverSideEncryptionDesc: AES-256-CTR streaming encryption for all stored objects
objectVersioningDesc: Multiple versions with delete markers for data recovery
lifecyclePoliciesDesc: Automated data retention and deletion rules
resourceQuotasDesc: Per-tenant storage limits and usage tracking
bucketNotificationsDesc: Real-time HTTP webhooks for S3 events (ObjectCreated, ObjectRemoved)
prometheusMetricsDesc: Real-time metrics export for monitoring and alerting
comprehensiveAuditLoggingDesc: 20+ event types tracked with automatic retention ({{days}} days)
dynamicSettingsDesc: Runtime configuration management without server restarts
complianceReadyDesc: GDPR, SOC 2, HIPAA, ISO 27001, PCI DSS support
auditTrailAccessDesc: Complete logging of authentication and access events
readOnlyAuditModeDesc: Global admins can audit tenant buckets without modification
csvExportDesc: Export audit logs for compliance reporting and analysis
